sources.title: The Family Holiday | Free Full Movie | FilmRise
sources.description:
A romantic family comedy about what happens when a thirty-something lovable conman who owes money to the mob stands to receive a twenty million dollar inheritance if he can prove he's forsaken his street days and settled down with a family. Starring Tony Anthony, Andrea Bates, and Kevin Connell.

metadata.Plot: A romantic family comedy about what happens when a thirty-something lovable pool hustler who owes money to the mob stands to receive a ten million dollar inheritance if he can prove he's forsaken his street days and settled down with a family. Dave Coulier stars. (2007)
metadata.Actors: Tony Anthony, Andrea Bates, Kevin Connell, Dave Coulier
